news.title: Afghanistan bring back former Ireland allrounder John Mooney as fielding coach
news.description: John Mooney joins the Afghanistanteam ahead of the UAE tri-series starting August 29

news.title: Junaid Siddique comes back as UAE ring in the changes for T20 tri-series
news.description: Harshit Kaushik, Muhammad Farooq and Muhammad Jawadullah are the others to have come into the side for the T20Is against Afghanistan and Pakistan

news.title: R Ashwin brings curtain down on 'my time as an IPL cricketer'
news.description: "My time as an explorer of the game around various leagues begins today," R Ashwin says

news.title: Auguste's 73 off 35 trumps Shepherd's 73* off 34 to lift St Lucia Kings to second
news.description: Oshane Thomas concedes 33 runs in a ten-ball over (the 15th of the Amazon Warriors innings) - the most expensive figures by a St Lucia Kings bowler in the CPL
news.description_text: Oshane Thomas concedes 33 runs in a ten-ball over (the 15th of the Amazon Warriors innings) - the most expensive figures by a St Lucia Kings bowler in the CPL

news.title: Jos Buttler's 70 leaves Northern Superchargers stuck in third
news.description: Trent Rockets now in pole position to finish second, which would grant them a Finals spot if the Eliminator is washed out
